document.full_text: a lawsuit filed on thursday charges a catholic priest known for ministering to indy car racing drivers and celebrities with sexually abusing a neighbor boy and later trying to buy his silence.
document.title: "indy 500" priest accused of abuse in u.s. lawsuit
lines_and_colors: a lawsuit filed on thursday charges a catholic priest known for ministering to indy car racing drivers and celebrities with sexually abusing a neighbor boy and later trying to buy his silence.
